summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4187for the improvement of 30th Avenue South, from College Street to McClellan Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances under Ordinance No. 49845, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
